      • acceptHead

        public boolean acceptHead(diva.canvas.connector.Connector c,
                          diva.canvas.Figure f)
        Accept the head of the connector.
        Overrides:
        acceptHead in class diva.canvas.connector.AbstractConnectorTarget
        Parameters:
        c - The connector.
        f - The figure.
        Returns:
        True if the object is a Port, a Vertex or a Locatable contained by a Port and the super class accepts the head. Otherwise, return false.
